meanings.definition: A person who collects or studies postage stamps.
meanings.sent1: Many philatelists enjoy searching for rare stamps.
meanings.sent2: The philatelists gathered at the stamp convention to trade stamps.
meanings.sent3: The philatelists were so focused on their stamps that they didn't notice the time passing.
meanings.sent4: In a world of digital communication, philatelists find joy in the tangible history of stamps.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the chatter of philatelists discussing their latest finds.
